data.title: New Zealand men's national basketball team
data.meta_description: The New Zealand men's national basketball team represents New Zealand in international basketball competitions. The team is governed by Basketball New Zealand. The team's official nickname is the Tall Blacks.
data.text:
Men's national basketball team representing New Zealand / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Dear Wikiwand AI, let's keep it short by simply answering these key questions:

Can you list the top facts and stats about New Zealand national basketball team?

Summarize this article for a 10 year old

SHOW ALL QUESTIONS

This article is about the men's team. For the women's team, see New Zealand women's national basketball team.

The New Zealand men's national basketball team (M훮ori: Te kapa poit큰kohu o Aotearoa) represents New Zealand in international basketball competitions. The team is governed by Basketball New Zealand. The team's official nickname is the Tall Blacks (M훮ori: Pango T훮roaroa).[2]

Quick Facts FIBA ranking, Joined FIBA ...

Close

Over their history, New Zealand have won three FIBA Oceania Championships, made seven appearances at the FIBA World Cup and two at the Olympic Games. Since 2017, the team has made two appearances at the FIBA Asia Cup, with their best effort resulting in a bronze medal finish in 2022.
